<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Token.empty() || (!Token.starts&#95;with(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;+&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &amp;&amp; !Token.starts&#95;with(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> O.error(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid extension list format: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + Token.str());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> ExtensionName = Token.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NameValuePair = <a href="#acc69830a46221294cfc7f04a3f7c99ee">SPIRVExtensionMap</a>.find(ExtensionName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NameValuePair == <a href="#acc69830a46221294cfc7f04a3f7c99ee">SPIRVExtensionMap</a>.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> O.error(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown SPIR-V extension: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + Token.str());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Token.starts&#95;with(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;+&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EnabledExtensions.insert(NameValuePair-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EnabledExtensions.count(NameValuePair-&gt;second)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::find(Tokens.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(), Tokens.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;+&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + ExtensionName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a223dd14e7d12bc5cea01889b972a98b2">str</a>()) !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Tokens.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> O.error(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Extension cannot be allowed and disallowed at the same time: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ExtensionName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a223dd14e7d12bc5cea01889b972a98b2">str</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EnabledExtensions.erase(NameValuePair-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Vals = std::move(EnabledExtensions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirvextensionsparser/#a1565934563ca4588b6385767ae235516"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirvextensionsparser/#a1565934563ca4588b6385767ae235516">SPIRVExtensionsParser::checkExtensions</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;std::string&gt; &amp;ExtNames,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::set&lt;SPIRV::Extension::Extension&gt; &amp;AllowedExtensions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Ext : ExtNames) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ext == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;all&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;ExtensionName, ExtensionEnum&#93; : <a href="#acc69830a46221294cfc7f04a3f7c99ee">SPIRVExtensionMap</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AllowedExtensions.insert(ExtensionEnum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="#acc69830a46221294cfc7f04a3f7c99ee">SPIRVExtensionMap</a>.find(Ext);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == <a href="#acc69830a46221294cfc7f04a3f7c99ee">SPIRVExtensionMap</a>.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ext;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AllowedExtensions.insert(It-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
